price: Dios sabe lo que ocultan y lo que manifiestan.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
